title: 'Ittefaq' remake: Sidharth Malhotra, Sonakshi Sinha begin shooting | Zee News
text:
Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Bollywood stars Sidharth Malhotra and Sonakshi Sinha on Monday began shooting for the remake of 'Ittefaq'. The duo took to Twitter to convey the same to their fans. They also posted an interesting picture on the micro-blogging site. 
In the image, the duo can be seen holding the clapperboard. 'Ittefaq' is being jointly produced by filmmaker Karan Johar’s Dharma Productions and superstar Shah Rukh Khan’s banner Red Chillies. 
The movie will be directed by Abhay Chopra. 
— Sonakshi Sinha (@sonakshisinha) 20 February 2017 
The original version of 'Ittefaq' was made by Yash Chopra and produced by BR Chopra. It featured Rajesh Khanna, Nanda, Bindu, Madan Puri and Iftekhar in prominent roles. MUST READ 
It was wholeheartedly appreciated by the audience and critics. First Published: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 16:59 More from zeenews
